name: Pooja Machines
overview:
Establsihed in the year 1996, we, “Pooja Machines Manufacturing Private Limited” have gained immense expertise in the process of manufacturing and supplying a wide range of best quality Air Pollution Control System the offered range has been availed to the major client base as per their requirements.

Our Team: Technicians Engineers Quality Auditors R&D Experts Warehousing & Packaging Experts Skilled Laborers

Measuring Instrument: Inside & Outside Micrometer Inside & Outside Vernier Calipers Vernier Hight Gauge Hydraulic & Pneumatic Testing Facility -Hydraulic Testing up to - 250 BAR Pressure -Pneumatic Testing up to - 20 BAR

Clientele: M/s. Al-Makaseeb, Dubai (Export Order) - 25 Tons capacity SS producing converter complete unit for making Stainless Steel (A.O.D. Converter) M/s. Jewels Seamless Ltd. Pithampur, Dhar (M.P.) - 22 Tons capacity SS producing Converter complete unit for making Stainless Steel (A.O.D. Converter) M/s Saurabh Metals Pvt. Ltd. Bhopal - 15 Tons capacity SS producing converter Complete Unit (A.O.D. Converter)

Our Quality: Our company since its inception itself has adhered to quality any how and has provided the customers with the best. So far, we have that ample of expertise in the processing of high quality machines and systems. Highly innovative and good quality has been our actual motto for which we make no compromises.

Client Satisfaction: Our company caters to a wide client base and this has been possible due to our client centric approach. We have defined for our well established company some norms and set of rules that shall be followed and adhered to by each of our organization member.
